file.name: drafts.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
paths:
    /drafts:
        get:
            parameters:
                - description: |
                      Filter drafts by record type.
                  in: query
                  name: recordType
                  schema:
                      enum:
                          - comment
                          - discussion
                      type: string
                - description: >
                      Filter by the unique ID of the parent for a draft. Used with
                      recordType.
                  in: query
                  name: parentRecordID
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                  allowEmptyValue: true
                - $ref: "#/components/parameters/Page"
                - description: |
                      Desired number of items per page.
                  in: query
                  name: limit
                  schema:
                      type: integer
                      default: 30
                      maximum: 100
                      minimum: 1
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    properties:
                                        attributes:
                                            description: >-
                                                A free-form object containing all custom data for this
                                                draft.
                                            type: object
                                        dateInserted:
                                            description: When the draft was created.
                                            format: date-time
                                            type: string
                                        dateUpdated:
                                            description: When the draft was updated.
                                            format: date-time
                                            nullable: true
                                            type: string
                                        draftID:
                                            description: The unique ID of the draft.
                                            type: integer
                                        insertUserID:
                                            description: The unique ID of the user who created this draft.
                                            type: integer
                                        parentRecordID:
                                            description: The unique ID of the intended parent to this record.
                                            nullable: true
                                            type: integer
                                        recordType:
                                            description: The type of record associated with this draft.
                                            enum:
                                                - comment
                                                - discussion
                                            minLength: 1
                                            type: string
                                        updateUserID:
                                            description: The unique ID of the user who updated this draft.
                                            nullable: true
                                            type: integer
                                    required:
                                        - draftID
                                        - recordType
                                        - parentRecordID
                                        - attributes
                                        - insertUserID
                                        - dateInserted
                                        - updateUserID
                                        - dateUpdated
                                    type: object
                                type: array
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Drafts
            summary: List drafts created by the current user.
        post:
            summary: Create a draft.
            responses:
                "201":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                properties:
                                    attributes:
                                        description: |
                                            A free-form object containing all custom data for this draft.
                                        type: object
                                    dateInserted:
                                        description: When the draft was created.
                                        format: date-time
                                        type: string
                                    dateUpdated:
                                        description: When the draft was updated.
                                        format: date-time
                                        nullable: true
                                        type: string
                                    draftID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the draft.
                                        type: integer
                                    insertUserID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the user who created this draft.
                                        type: integer
                                    parentRecordID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the intended parent to this record.
                                        nullable: true
                                        type: integer
                                    recordType:
                                        description: The type of record associated with this draft.
                                        enum:
                                            - comment
                                            - discussion
                                        minLength: 1
                                        type: string
                                    updateUserID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the user who updated this draft.
                                        nullable: true
                                        type: integer
                                required:
                                    - draftID
                                    - recordType
                                    - parentRecordID
                                    - attributes
                                    - insertUserID
                                    - dateInserted
                                    - updateUserID
                                    - dateUpdated
                                type: object
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Drafts
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DraftPost"
                required: true
    "/drafts/{id}":
        delete:
            parameters:
                - description: |
                      The draft ID.
                  in: path
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "204":
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Drafts
            summary: Delete a draft.
        get:
            parameters:
                - description: |
                      The draft ID.
                  in: path
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                properties:
                                    attributes:
                                        description: |
                                            A free-form object containing all custom data for this draft.
                                        type: object
                                    dateInserted:
                                        description: When the draft was created.
                                        format: date-time
                                        type: string
                                    dateUpdated:
                                        description: When the draft was updated.
                                        format: date-time
                                        nullable: true
                                        type: string
                                    draftID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the draft.
                                        type: integer
                                    insertUserID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the user who created this draft.
                                        type: integer
                                    parentRecordID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the intended parent to this record.
                                        nullable: true
                                        type: integer
                                    recordType:
                                        description: The type of record associated with this draft.
                                        enum:
                                            - comment
                                            - discussion
                                        minLength: 1
                                        type: string
                                    updateUserID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the user who updated this draft.
                                        nullable: true
                                        type: integer
                                required:
                                    - draftID
                                    - recordType
                                    - parentRecordID
                                    - attributes
                                    - insertUserID
                                    - dateInserted
                                    - updateUserID
                                    - dateUpdated
                                type: object
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Drafts
            summary: Get a draft.
        patch:
            parameters:
                - description: The draft ID.
                  in: path
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                properties:
                                    attributes:
                                        description: |
                                            A free-form object containing all custom data for this draft.
                                        type: object
                                    draftID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the draft.
                                        type: integer
                                    parentRecordID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the intended parent to this record.
                                        nullable: true
                                        type: integer
                                required:
                                    - draftID
                                    - parentRecordID
                                    - attributes
                                type: object
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Drafts
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            $ref: "#/components/schemas/DraftPost"
                required: true
            summary: Update a draft.
    "/drafts/{id}/edit":
        get:
            parameters:
                - description: |
                      The draft ID.
                  in: path
                  name: id
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                properties:
                                    attributes:
                                        description: |
                                            A free-form object containing all custom data for this draft.
                                        type: object
                                    draftID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the draft.
                                        type: integer
                                    parentRecordID:
                                        description: The unique ID of the intended parent to this record.
                                        nullable: true
                                        type: integer
                                required:
                                    - draftID
                                    - parentRecordID
                                    - attributes
                                type: object
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Drafts
            summary: Get a draft for editing.
components:
    schemas:
        DraftPost:
            type: object
            properties:
                attributes:
                    description: A free-form object containing all custom data for this draft.
                    type: object
                parentRecordID:
                    description: The unique ID of the intended parent to this record.
                    nullable: true
                    type: integer
                recordType:
                    description: The type of record associated with this draft.
                    enum:
                        - comment
                        - discussion
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string
            required:
                - recordType
                - attributes
        DraftPatch:
            type: object
            properties:
                attributes:
                    description: A free-form object containing all custom data for this draft.
                    type: object
                parentRecordID:
                    description: The unique ID of the intended parent to this record.
                    nullable: true
                    type: integer
                recordType:
                    description: The type of record associated with this draft.
                    enum:
                        - comment
                        - discussion
                    minLength: 1
                    type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /drafts: get: parameters: parse parameter "": resolve "#/components/parameters/Page" reference: component by reference not found
